description:
When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Excitement Blow-Out! Sanji`s Life Under Threat!
Koufun Bakuhatsu! Sanji Seimei no Kiki!
L`excitation à son comble ! Sanji en danger !
Взрыв от возбуждения! Санджи угрожает опасность!
興奮爆発! サンジ生命の危機!
